source_objects.description: Become a database expert with these courses ranging from basic SQL to Hadoop and Oracle mastery.
source_objects.title: Database Design & Development

items.title: Modern Data Architecture using Microsoft Azure
items.headline: An introduction to Azure Data-warehousing Technologies and Principles
objectives_summary: Navigate the Azure Portal
Create Resource Groups and Provisioning in Azure
Create and Load an Azure SQL Database

items.title: SQLite Databases | Python Programming: (Build App and API )
items.headline: Learn SQLite | Python : Build a database driven app and API  with Python and SQLite
objectives_summary: Build an app with Python and SQLIte
Build an API from scratch
Create and activate a virtual environment

items.title: Learn Partitioning in PostgreSQL from Scratch
items.headline: A-Z guide to design and implement partitions in PostgreSQL ( Postgres ) Database
objectives_summary: Understand what, when and how to partition
Implement partitions in production system
Write optimized queries to make use of the designed partitions

items.title: Oracle SQL for Beginners - The fundamentals
items.headline: Easy learn Oracle Sql using Livesql. SQL statements explained word by word. Example files included for each lesson.
objectives_summary: Learn Oracle SQL using Livesql, no software installation required.
84 lectures (5.5 hours of content) teaching you the fundamentals of SQL Statements.
Every SQL statement explained word by word.

items.title: DATABASE SQL Queries Hands-on Training with MS SQL SERVER
items.headline: Quick Learn DATABASE SQL with Microsoft SQL SERVER to develop real-world Database applications from beginner to expert.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to install Free Version of SQL SERVER with Management Studio and understand SQL SERVER Structure.
Create Database and Tables in SQL.
Learn to use SELECT, WHERE, ORDER BY, TOP, (Logical, Special & Comparison) Operators, ALIAS, Computed Column and CASE statement.

items.title: Oracle Cloud Security Data Protection and Encryption
items.headline: Get the groundwork for DBA about Oracle database cloud Security hands-on step by step including SQL commands and scripts
objectives_summary: Learn how to identify the major risks and security threats, and review general best practices for properly protecting and "hardening" any production database

items.title: Beginner Data Analysis Using SQL and Microsoft SQL Server
items.headline: Learn Hands-On  how to build Real World SQL Queries  to answer questions with data.
objectives_summary: Analyse various types of data Using SQL
Analyse Data from multiple Database Tables
Sort Data for analysis

items.title: Learning Path: Build Your Own Recommendation Engines
items.headline: Make valuable future-ready decisions that are backed by data using modern recommender systems
objectives_summary: Discover the tools needed to build recommendation engines
Dive into the various techniques of recommender systems such as collaborative, content-based, and cross-recommendations
Familiarize yourself with machine learning algorithms in different frameworks

items.title: Create a Python Application to connect to multiple databases
items.headline: Create a Python App and Connect to and interact with Databases : PostgreSQL | MySQL |SQL Server | Oracle|SQLite
objectives_summary: Install and setup multiple database systems
Create virtual environments
Install database connector drivers for multiple database systems

items.title: Oracle APEX 19 : SQL, PL/SQL to Web Application Development

visible_instructors.title: Guha Rajan M., B.Engg, MBA, PMP
visible_instructors.name: Guha Rajan
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder and CEO - Capstone Solutions, Trainer
visible_instructors.display_name: Guha Rajan M., B.Engg, MBA, PMP

items.headline: Learn with ease to build web application with Oracle sql, pl/sql, APEX  through cloud without any installation.
objectives_summary: An overview about Oracle SQL statement and PL/SQL
Details about using Oracle APEX tool to create web application
How Oracle APEX, LiveSQL can be used to learn SQL and PLSQL without any installation.

items.title: PostgreSQL v12 Database Administration  on Win/Linux- Part 2
items.headline: Comprehensive Guide to PostgreSQL v12 Database Replication :  Walk-in a Beginner, Walk-Out an Expert
objectives_summary: Replication & It’s Terminologies
Log Based Shipping Standby
Streaming Replication & Fail over

items.title: The Philosophy of FileMaker - Part 3
items.headline: Intermediate FileMaker Pro 15 Scripting, Calculations, Relationships and Reporting
objectives_summary: Design a multi-user solution
Identify and create one-to-many, many-to-one, one-to-one and many-to-many relationships
Create an Entity-Relationship diagram (ERD)

items.title: SQL Bootcamp - Hands-On Exercises - SQLite - Part I
items.headline: Start your journey with SQL and databases. Solve over 150 exercises and open the door to a career in IT! (DQL)
objectives_summary: solve 150 exercises using the SQL language
test yourself in DQL (Data Query Language)
test yourself in creating and executing database queries

items.title: Create Database Applications Using MS Access 2013
items.headline: Create real world database applications. Easy to Follow Lectures. Boost Your Resume and Earning Potentials!.
objectives_summary: Confidently develop database applications using Microsoft Access
Understand MS Access and how it can be applied to solve real world problems
Understand and Implement best practice database design concepts

items.title: Hyperledger Fabric 2.x on Kubernetes/AWS Complete w/Org Add
items.headline: Building the future of server-side applications (Hyperledger, Kubernetes, GoLang, VueJS, CouchDB)
objectives_summary: Architect a hyperledger network.
Architect our network on a local Kubernetes network
Deploy our network on AWS with Kops

items.title: SQL Interview | +150 SQL Interview Questions in 2020
items.headline: Prepare for a SQL interview in 2019. With over 150 SQL interview questions with answers.
objectives_summary: Learn how to answer SQL questions on interview
Prepare for a SQL interview
Practice SQL knowledge on +55 queries
